venue_description: Del Mar Horsepark is a renowned equestrian facility nestled in the picturesque coastal town of Del Mar, California. After nearly four years of closure, the park experienced a joyful revival when HITS reopened the gates during the Del Mar Sunshine Classic; today the revitalized venue is again a hub of equestrian excellence and a gathering place for riders and spectatorshttps://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g60750-d26684494-Reviews-HITS_Del_Mar_Horsepark-San_Diego_California.html#:~:text=Del%20Mar%20Horsepark%20is%20a,for%20riders%20and%20spectators%20alike.
